snippet: Bobby Petrino was introduced Monday as Western Kentucky’s new football coach, eight months after he was fired by Arkansas for a “pattern of misleading” behavior.
abstract: Western Kentucky introduces Bobby Petrino as its new football coach, eight months after he was fired by Arkansas for poor behavior; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bobby Petrino was introduced Monday as Western Kentucky’s new football coach, eight months after he was fired by Arkansas for a “pattern of misleading” behavior.

headline.main: Western Kentucky Hires Petrino as Its Coach
